Incredible competitive game with a great comunity. good fps !

The point of the game is that you have 2 teams, ct's and t's. Terrorist are supposed to win by planting the bomb or just eliminating the opponents, ct's win by defusing the bomb or eliminating the t's before they plant.
Great game and recommend buying premium status.
